ftbquests.chapter.31DCF574F929CCEF.title: SlashBlade Chapter
ftbquests.chapter.39F6874C721A5288.quest: Welcome to UMA New World Modpack.
U.M.A New World is a song from Umamusume: Pretty Derby, marks a new phase for the project.
This Modpack is the beginner pack for Umapyoi Mod and relative projects, focus on providing a good experience for new players.

This quests will tell the players how to play the main mods in modpack, players can also enjoy the game according to their own playing style. For more information, please refer to the specific quest chapters and content.
Welcome to the New World!
First Game
U.M.A New World!!
This modpack comes with keepInventory enabled to reduce death penalties.
Training Uma Musume will provide very comprehensive enhancements for your adventure, and is the most significant and easiest way in this modpack to boost player and maid attributes.
All values in this modpack use default mod values and are usually not modified. Any modifications will be noted here.
Just in case, let me mention it
Feature Explanation
JEI is a classic mod for looking up crafting recipes and items.
By default, press U on an item to show uses, press R to show recipes.
You can also use the search bar to find items. Use @ + mod name to search for items from that mod (Note: English only).
Yes, yes, yes, right?
JEI Introduction
There are two maps in this pack: JourneyMap and the FTB built-in map. The default minimap is JourneyMap.
By default, press J to open JourneyMap, press M to open the FTB map.
The FTB map is mainly used for claiming chunks to protect builds or force-loading (overuse is not recommended).
Going home and finding structures is easier
JourneyMap
The new version of SlashBlade thoughtfully provides a moveset guide in the advancements menu (&mstrange display methods increased&r)\
Press L by default to open the advancements interface.
Similarly, SlashBlade recipes can usually be looked up directly via JEI. SlashBlades requiring special acquisition methods will have their methods noted in quests.
Yes, it has a moveset guide
SlashBlade Moveset Guide
JADE is an auxiliary mod for highlighting items, showing growth progress, etc.
By default, press NumPad 0 to configure JADE.
Highlighting items, who doesn't like it
JADE

&bBig Bro, One of Us

ftbquests.chapter.4299FB35FE8523E1.title: Twilight Forest
ftbquests.chapter.59E9B0129F84D3AF.quest: This is a mod themed around "Uma Musume: Pretty Derby", with "Training and Inheritance" as its core gameplay.
The core of this mod is the "cultivation of the Uma Musume's Soul". In other words, it's a mod about crafting powerful accessories through iterative refinement of finished products.
Follow this questline to learn more about the main gameplay content of this mod.
&n&7Silver Support Album Pedestal&r&r summoning probability when placing the following items:
&aSupport Card Ticket&r: R probability 70%%, &eSR probability 20%%&r, &dSSR probability 10%%&r
&aSupport Card Ticket&r: R probability 70%%, &eSR probability 20%%&r, &dSSR probability 10%%&r
&n&6Support Album Pedestal&r&r summoning probability when placing the following items:
What are the summoning probabilities for different Support Card rarities?
Support Card Summoning Probabilities by Rarity
R &2Support Card&r &6Durability is 10&r, &eSR&r &2Support Card&r &6Durability is 8&r, &5SSR&r &2Support Card&r &6Durability is 5&r, &eFriend&r/&2Team&r &2Support Cards&r &6Durability is 1&r.
A Level I &aSupport Effect&r in a &2Support Card&r increases the corresponding &5Attribute&r by 1 rating.
A Level II &aSupport Effect&r increases the corresponding &5Attribute&r by 2 ratings.
A Level III &aSupport Effect&r increases the corresponding &5Attribute&r by 3 ratings, and so on.

Example &aIntelligence&r: G/&9UG+&r &3Uma Soul&r uses a [Basic Training] Intelligence Training &2Support Card&r with &aSupport Effect&r &aIntelligence Boost I&r in the &n&6Training Facility Terminal&r&r, after training the &3Uma Soul&r's &aIntelligence&r &5Attribute&r rating increase becomes &aIntelligence&r: G+/&9UG+&r;

&6Switching to&r an &e[Advanced Training] Intelligence Training&r with &aSupport Effect&r &aIntelligence Boost II&r, after training the &3Uma Soul&r, its &aIntelligence&r &5Attribute&r rating increase becomes &aIntelligence&r: &5F+&r/&9UG+&r;

&6Adding&r a &d[Master Training] Intelligence Training&r with &aSupport Effect&r &aIntelligence Boost III&r, after training the &3Uma Soul&r, its &aIntelligence&r &5Attribute&r rating increase becomes &aIntelligence&r: &aC&r/&9UG+&r. &6[Page 2 Summary]&r
&6Summary&r: The same &aSupport Effect&r can &61+1=2&r increase ratings:
&6I&r increases by &61&r rating &0|&r G â†’ G+;
&2Support Card&r content is divided into &aSupporter&r and &aSupport Effect&r.
&aSupporter&r is the &6Uma Musume&r corresponding to this &2Support Card&r. &aSupport Effect&r is the &5Attribute increase level&r and &6Skill&r this card can provide.
&2Support Cards&r can have some &4paradox issues&r causing &4inability to use&r:
(2) The &3Uma Soul&r in the &3Training Slot&r and the &2Support Card&r's &aSupporter&r &4being the same Uma Musume cannot be used simultaneously&r.
&3Uma Soul&r can be differentiated into &3Uma Soul&r and &bUma's Will&r through &6Honkaku-ka&r in the &n&6Training Registration Stand&r&r.

After &6Honkaku-ka&r, the &3Uma Soul&r &4can no longer improve attributes&r and &4cannot gain skills&r, but its &5Attributes&r will be &eX4&r, and it can be equipped normally in the &6Accessory Slot&r and display the &6Uma Model&r.
What is the purpose of Uma Soul Honkaku-ka?
&bUma's Will&r can be used at the &n&6Three Goddess Statue&r&r to let a &bFaded Uma Soul&r inherit some &5Attributes&r and &6Skills&r.
Skill books can be obtained by trading with Trainer villagers or found in dungeons.
Place the Uma Soul needing the skill and the skill book in the Skill Learning Table to learn specific skills.
Training and Factor Inheritance also have a chance to learn specific skills, but some skills can only be obtained through skill learning.
If you have unwanted Uma Souls or Support Cards, you can convert them into corresponding crystals via the "Transfer Registration Stand".
How to recycle Uma Souls and Support Cards?
Recycling Uma Souls and Support Cards
Use the "Self-Selection Registration Stand" to specify the outcome of a Single Pull Ticket by consuming Lapis Lazuli.
Single Pull Tickets can only specify Uma Musume or Support Cards of the corresponding rarity. Blank Single Pull Tickets cannot be specified.
How to pull specific Uma Souls and Support Cards?
Pulling Specific Uma Souls and Support Cards
Eating some foods that Uma Musume like can boost Motivation.
Stamina recovers naturally. Of course, you can also drink some beverages.
Here are items provided for you that can restore Stamina.
Of course, costumes are more for decorative purposes.

&3Uma Soul&r can be obtained by placing &5Carrot Gem&r, &cBlank Single Pull Ticket&r, &bUma Ticket&r, &bGold Uma Ticket&r, &bRainbow Uma Ticket&r on the &n&7Silver Uma Summon Pedestal&r&r or &n&6Uma Summon Pedestal&r&r, waiting a few seconds to summon a &bFaded Uma Soul&r, then converting it into a &3Uma Soul&r using the &n&7Three Goddess Statue&r&r.
(Note! &bRainbow Uma Ticket&r can only be summoned on the &n&6Uma Summon Pedestal&r&r. It &4cannot be summoned&r on the &n&7Silver Uma Summon Pedestal&r&r)
Using an Uma Soul on a statue yields the corresponding Uma statue.
What is the use of Uma statues?
Notebooks, Tactic Books, and Secret Books can be used directly at the Training Terminal.
They can also be right-clicked while transformed into a non-retired Uma to increase attributes.
How to use Notebooks, Tactic Books, Secret Books?
Using Notebooks, Tactic Books, Secret Books
For more settings about the Umapyoi mod, please consult the "Tresen Trainer Handbook".
The &6rarity&r of &3Uma Souls&r, from low to high, are R, &eSR&r, &dSSR&r. These identifiers are not shown in-game but can be recognized by color:
R: White Nameless Light Pink Uma &0
What rarities do Uma Souls have?

What are the summoning probabilities for different Uma Soul rarities?
Uma Soul Summoning Probabilities by Rarity
The &5main attributes&r of a &3Uma Soul&r are &bSpeed&r, &4Stamina&r, &6Power&r, &cGuts&r, &aIntelligence&r. The &6functions&r of these &5attributes&r are:
The &5attribute rating cap&r for &3Uma Souls&r is generally &eSS+&r, with only a few &3Uma Souls&r having a &5attribute rating cap&r of &9UG&r or &9UG+&r.
The rating for &5each attribute&r is G, G+, &5F&r, &5F+&r, &dE&r, &dE+&r, &bD&r, &bD+&r, &aC&r, &aC+&r, &4B&r, &4B+&r, &cA&r, &cA+&r, &eS&r, &eS+&r, &eSS&r, &eSS+&r, &9UG&r, &9UG+&r.
What are the attributes of Uma Souls?
The &6Durability&r of a &3Uma Soul&r determines how many times it can be trained in the &n&6Training Facility Terminal&r&r.
&6Skills&r can be cycled by pressing the &eUp&r and &eDown&r arrow keys, then pressing &e[&r consumes a certain amount of &9Stamina&r to trigger the &6Skill&r effect.
Obtained &3Uma Souls&r have a minimum &6Durability&r of &61&r and a maximum of &65&r.

&3Uma Souls&r can be equipped in the &6Accessory Slot&r. After equipping, the player's skin will change to the &6Uma Model&r, and the player gains the current &5Attributes&r and &6Skills&r of that &3Uma Soul&r.
The &6Motivation Level&r on the &6right side of the inventory&r determines the &5attribute effectiveness&r of the &2Uma Soul&r, from highest to lowest:
How to properly use Uma Souls?
&3Uma Souls&r can &5improve attributes&r through training in the &n&6Training Facility Terminal&r&r.
&2Support Card&r durability consumed to zero will &4disappear&r. &3Uma Soul&r durability consumed to zero will be &4unable to train&r.

Opening the &n&6Training Facility Terminal&r&r shows 6 upper slots for placing different &2Support Cards&r (&2Support Card Slots&r), and 1 lower slot for placing the &3Uma Soul&r with &6Durability&r (&3Training Slot&r).

The icons below the &2Support Card Slots&r, from left to right, are &bSpeed&r, &4Stamina&r, &6Power&r, &cGuts&r, &aIntelligence&r, &eFriend&r, &2Team&r. They show the count of &2Support Card types&r in the &2Support Card Slots&r. &eFriend&r and &2Team&r are special identifiers:
&eFriend Card&r, &4does not provide attributes&r, but provides &especial support effects&r;
&2Team Card&r, provides large amounts of &2attributes and unique support effects&r, but &4has multiple supporters making conflicts extremely likely&r.

After placing &2Support Cards&r in the &2Support Card Slots&r and placing a &3Uma Soul&r with &6Durability&r in the &3Training Slot&r, an Uma running animation appears. Upon reaching the finish line, all &2Support Cards&r in the &2Support Card Slots&r and the &3Uma Soul&r in the &3Training Slot&r will &6lose 1 Durability&r, and the &3Uma Soul&r's corresponding &5Attributes&r will improve based on the &2Support Cards&r used.
How to train Uma Souls to improve attributes?

&2Support Cards&r can be obtained by placing a book on the &n&7Silver Uma Summon Pedestal&r&r or &n&6Uma Summon Pedestal&r&r to turn them into a &n&7Silver Support Album Pedestal&r&r or &n&6Support Album Pedestal&r&r, then placing &5Carrot Gem&r, &cBlank Single Pull Ticket&r, &aSupport Card Ticket&r, &aGold Support Card Ticket&r, &aRainbow Support Card Ticket&r, waiting a few seconds to summon &2Support Cards&r.
(Note! &aRainbow Support Card Ticket&r &2can only&r be summoned on the &n&6Uma Summon Pedestal&r&r. It &4cannot be summoned&r on the &n&7Silver Uma Summon Pedestal&r&r)
